title: Ostriches: Giant Birds
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 273 words, Level J (Grade 1), Lexile 440L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     S and X
description: Ostriches are fascinating creatures. Not only are they the world's largest birds, but they also have the largest eyes of any land animal! Students will learn these and other interesting facts in Ostriches: Giant Birds. Maps and fascinating pictures support the text.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
